name: Spork 64
overview: Use your spork to stab roaming baddies. Plays like crap with a gamepad through emulation. Nice music though. Would be better off with actual hardware and a joystick, or a PC joystick instead of a pad. Nice concept, almost sort of like a Whack-a-Mole variant. Published in GO64! 2005/07, and in GO64! 2005/10.
publishers: Retro64 (C64 Demo and Game development Group)
